wobani.core

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.GameLoop

  • public class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
    The engine's main game loop.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(@Nullable
                              WindowParameters parameters)
        Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more. You should call it before any OpenGL or OpenAL related code and before the GameLoop's run method.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parameters for the window

      • initializeWithoutInspection

        public static void initializeWithoutInspection(@Nullable
                                               WindowParameters parameters)
        Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more. You should call it before any OpenGL or OpenAL related code and before the GameLoop's run method.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parameters for the window

      • initializeWindowAndInput

        private static void initializeWindowAndInput(@Nullable
                                             WindowParameters parameters)
        Initializes the window and the input system.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parameters for the window

      • initializeOpenGlOpenAl

        private static void initializeOpenGlOpenAl()
        Initializes OpenGL and OpenAL.

      • handleException

        private static void handleException(@NotNull
                                    java.lang.Exception ex)
        Handles the given exception. It logs the exception, releases the resoruces and closes the program.
        Parameters:
        ex - Exception

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more. You should call it before any OpenGL or OpenAL related code and before the GameLoop's run method.

      • run

        public static void run()
        The engine's game loop. It updates all Components of the GameObjectContainer, updates the Resources, renders the scene, handles the input and swaps the buffers and handle exceptions. Before calling this method, you should initialize the engine. You can do it by by calling the initialize method.

      • gameLoop

        private static void gameLoop()
        The engine's game loop. It updates all Components of the GameObjectContainer, updates the resources, renders the scene, handles the input and swaps the buffers in every frame.

      • update

        private static void update()
        Updates the Resources, the Components and update.

      • windowing

        private static void windowing()
        Swaps the window's buffers and poll events.

      • release

        public static void release()
        Releases all the Resources, the windowing system and the OpenAL. After calling this method you can no longer use Meshes, Splines, Textures, sounds, FBOs, the rendering pipeline or the window.
